# tf.contrib.eager.list_devices

``` python
list_devices()
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/eager/context.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.5/tensorflow/python/eager/context.py).

List the names of the available devices.

#### Returns:

Names of the available devices, as a `list`.
